comments.body: Why is fLenType not already set correctly?

Not clear to me.  It is a member of `TLeaf`, but is only used / set for the primitive sub-classes (`TLeafI`, `TLeafD`, etc) and has gone unused by `TLeafElement`.

Luckily, `TLeaf::GenerateOffsetArrayBase` is correct for `TLeafElement` as long as `fLenType` is set appropriately.

`fLenType` is unneeded for deserialization because `TLeafElement` invokes the streamer, I think:

https://github.com/root-project/root/blob/master/tree/tree/inc/TLeafElement.h#L50
